description: When Remy Cruz's girlfriend asks him if her brother can stay with him for a bit he agrees, but he is shocked at how hot Nick Fitt is, and it doesn't help that he's a nudest! Remy cannot stop fantasizing about what it would be like to suck Nick's big, thick, dick that's been flaunted around his cock-craving face! Time to have a taste of Nick's fit body and slick holes.
title: My Girlfriend's Brother, Scene #01
